name: Joe Walsh
summary: Former Tea Party Congressman and conservative radio host who initially supported Trump but became a vocal critic, challenging him in the 2020 Republican primary and endorsing Joe Biden.

keyStatements.quote: Trump is unfit. Trump is a would-be dictator. It's not enough to beat him. He needs to be destroyed.
I'm going to do everything I can to help elect Joe Biden as our next president.
keyStatements.context: Endorsing Biden after dropping out of GOP primary

keyStatements.quote: On January 6, 2021, Donald Trump committed the most un-American act ever by a President. On that day, he ended his legacy. And on that day, he lost me forever.

timeline.event: Elected to U.S. House of Representatives

timeline.significance: Ran against Trump in 2020 GOP primary

credibility.background: Former U.S. Representative, Tea Party leader, conservative radio host, 2020 Republican primary challenger to Trump
